bill_title: establish content standards of learning in the fine arts.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to establish content standards of learning in the fine arts. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. Each school district shall adopt and implement clearly defined and measurable course guidelines for grades one through twelve in order to meet the state academic content standards in areas of music, visual art, and drama as approved by the State Board of Education. Course guidelines for music shall be adopted by July 1, 2002, and for visual art and drama by July 1, 2003. Section 2. The Secretary of the Department and Cultural Affairs shall establish a uniform system for reporting and gathering the completed course guidelines from each school district. 500 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.021 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
